text: He mominaharu! Jaba timi allahako margama (jihadako lagi) janchau ta bado chanavinale kama garne gara ra juna manisale timisita as'salamu'alaikuma bhandacha usala'i timi momina ho'inau bhani nabhana. Ra, jasabata timro uddesya sansarika labha prapta garnu cha bhane allahasita yasta pha'idaka samagriharu thuprai chan. Timi pani ta pahila yastai thiyau ra pachi allahale timimathi aphno krpa garyae. Tasartha timi ramrari chanabina garne gara. Nihsandeha juna karmaharu timile gardachau, sabai allahala'i thaha cha
